Errors.404_DESC: Oops... this page seems to have been lost in the universe - I think the intern had a bit too much free time! Maybe you mistyped the URL or it was deleted? I'm sad about it. üòî

Footer.copyright: üíñ made with love and attention to detail
Footer.description: Bl4cklist is a German gaming and tech Discord server that provides a friendly community for gamers and tech enthusiasts. Join our growing community and enjoy exciting discussions, events, and shared gaming sessions.

Dropdown.serverTeamDesc: Get to know our awesome team!
Dropdown.ourHistoryDesc: This is how it all started for us..
Dropdown.techFeaturesDesc: Learn what we do to help you!
Dropdown.faqDesc: We have an answer for everything!
Dropdown.formerTeamMembersDesc: Without them there would have been chaos for a long time..
Dropdown.globalChatDesc: Chat with users from other servers!

WelcomeHero.description: Our German Discord server for technology and gaming is the perfect community for everyone interested in programming, coding help, and current gaming trends. üöÄ

IntroSection.title: THIS IS US.
IntroSection.description: Bl4cklist is a general coding & tech Discord server with a main focus on Discord bots and offers its own programming courses.
IntroSection.description2: But we have even more: Spend your time chatting with our loving community, make new friends or just relax and enjoy all kinds of news from the gaming world - we want to connect the most diverse Discord server communities.
IntroSection.tip_1_desc: ‚Ä∫ Ask your questions in our Discord server and get quick help from our community ‚Äì whether it's a bug or a general coding problem.
IntroSection.tip_2_desc: ‚Ä∫ In our counseling you can (also anonymously) talk about personal problems ‚Äì our community listens and gives you supportive advice.
IntroSection.tip_3_desc: ‚Ä∫ Our lovingly own developed Discord bots support you on managing your Discord server and are available in several languages.
IntroSection.tip_4_desc: ‚Ä∫ We host plenty of new events & giveaways every week where you can win all kinds of different prizes.
IntroSection.tip_5_desc: ‚Ä∫ With us you will find 500+ Discord server templates for the perfect start & you can also advertise your Discord server.
IntroSection.tip_6_desc: ‚Ä∫ Our Discord bot publishes the latest articles from the gaming & tech world around the clock with the help of GameStar to keep you entertained.

TeamSection.infoTag: WHO TAKES CARE OF OUR DISCORD COMMUNITY?
TeamSection.title: THE SERVER TEAM
TeamSection.description: ‚Ä∫ Our dedicated server team ensures safety, support, and exciting community events on our Discord server, so all members can feel comfortable and have fun together.
TeamSection.rank_owner_desc: The management takes care of the entire server administration, organization, and the implementation of new ideas.
TeamSection.rank_admin_desc: The admins mostly support the management or sometimes already help with processing applications.
TeamSection.rank_senior_desc: The senior mods are experienced moderators and take care of the support team. They act as a kind of "mentor."
TeamSection.rank_mod_desc: The mods are important parts of the team. They handle tickets, moderation, and administer smaller elements.
TeamSection.rank_dev_desc: The developers take care of the development of our systems and assist the management with technical implementation.
TeamSection.rank_helper_desc: The helpers are new to our team. They handle support tickets, moderate the chat, and are getting used to their tasks.

HistorySection.infoTag: HOW DID WE ACTUALLY COME ABOUT?
HistorySection.title: THE HISTORY..
HistorySection.description: üìú ‚Ä∫ Together with our Discord community, we've experienced a lot. We've made many wonderful new memories and found lots of new friends. Bl4cklist was a place to forget the stress of everyday life for a while.
HistorySection.description2: ‚ö° ‚Ä∫ But this was just the beginning: Even after many revolutionary and unique ideas, we're still going strong: We'll always be here for you & we still have plenty of tricks up our sleeve to keep you entertained and inspired.
HistorySection.description3: üíñ ‚Ä∫ We are grateful to every single user who has visited, chatted, donated, or supported us within our team over the past time. Without you, Bl4cklist wouldn't be what it is today and we won't forget a single one of you!
HistorySection.description4: ü§î ‚Ä∫ To give you a little insight into what we've experienced together, we've compiled some special moments here.
HistorySection.ITEM_1_DESC: ‚Ä∫ So that server admins no longer have to set up the Discord bot awkwardly via countless slash commands, we have implemented a beautiful dashboard for it.
HistorySection.ITEM_2_TITLE: üî• ~ All bots in one: Clank goes public!
HistorySection.ITEM_2_DESC: ‚Ä∫ It took us a lot of time to work on the individual Discord bots, so we bundled them all into one: Clank happily sees the light of day!
HistorySection.ITEM_3_DESC: ‚Ä∫ Earn karma to unlock new server benefits by solving programming questions from other users - the channel system is inspired by StackOverflow.
HistorySection.ITEM_4_TITLE: ü§ñ ~ Rebrand: Tech is our thing now!
HistorySection.ITEM_4_DESC: ‚Ä∫ As our own websites, Discord bots & server management became more of a topic and interest grew, we switched to a new, more fitting server theme.
HistorySection.ITEM_5_DESC: ‚Ä∫ This was meant to help server admins build and launch a good Discord server - with useful tutorials & many server templates from the community!
HistorySection.ITEM_6_DESC: ‚Ä∫ With our own support bot, tickets should be organized & easy to process with lots of useful information (like team availability info or FAQ topics)
HistorySection.ITEM_7_DESC: ‚Ä∫ We thought about it for a long time and you wished for it - we set up a counseling channel where you can (even anonymously) talk about your problems.
HistorySection.ITEM_8_DESC: ‚Ä∫ Our Discord server has now existed for about 2 years and it's time for a real identity: We have set a new server theme (community server in the "Wild West") & logo.
HistorySection.ITEM_9_DESC: ‚Ä∫ Probably our most popular Discord bot was finally released after over 6 months and has been continuously improved over the years with the help of our community - with an eye for detail!
HistorySection.ITEM_10_DESC: ‚Ä∫ During this time, Discord had enormous problems with massive bot accounts - we developed an automatic & strong protection so you can protect your communities.
HistorySection.ITEM_11_TITLE: üåç ~ The first Discord bot: Global Chat
HistorySection.ITEM_11_DESC: ‚Ä∫ This bot enables server-wide communication with other users, even if they are not on your server - this is practical for smaller servers for more active chats & some advertising.
HistorySection.ITEM_12_DESC: ‚Ä∫ Our first own website was meant to present our Discord server, highlight our server partners and reach new users, in search of our own identity..
HistorySection.ITEM_13_DESC: ‚Ä∫ Discord was something completely new for everyone: it was exciting! Started as a small GTA5 crew, we evolved into a general community server.

CodingHero.title: TECH & CODING
CodingHero.description: Our Discord server focuses heavily on software development & technology. We offer small learning courses, public Discord bots, a coding support channel, and automated tech news from GameStar.
CodingHero.description2: Our coding support system is inspired by StackOverflow and each helpful answer is rewarded! Take a look and maybe we can solve your unanswered problem.

CodingFeatures.infoTag: HOW CAN WE HELP YOU LEARN PROGRAMMING?
CodingFeatures.title: WHAT WE OFFER YOU!
CodingFeatures.description: ‚Ä∫ The world of hardware & software is mysterious and complex: We've also had a tough journey to climb this path! However, we offer several major features that can help you implement your own project in no time or get an exciting first insight.
CodingFeatures.BENTO_1_DESC: Always stay informed about the latest topics from the gaming & tech world!
CodingFeatures.BENTO_2_DESC: In our coding support, you can help other users with their code errors or questions & also get help yourself.
CodingFeatures.BENTO_3_DESC: Our small learning courses help you better understand programming.
CodingFeatures.BENTO_4_DESC: We have developed our own Discord bots with great attention to detail, which can inspire you or improve your server.
CodingFeatures.BENTO_5_DESC: Our huge collection of uniquely created Discord server templates helps you build & organize your new super cool project.

CodingFAQ.title: Your Questions..
CodingFAQ.description: ‚Ä∫ Over the past years, we've collected some interesting questions about our coding system that we're happy to answer! üöÄ

feature1.title: Promote Your Project
feature1.description: Reach a huge community & increase interest in your own project!

feature2.title: Our Discord Help
feature2.description: We have a huge collection of articles that help you set up your Discord server.

feature3.title: Get Free Games
feature3.description: Save real money and be notified immediately about every new free game!

feature4.title: Learn Together With Us
feature4.description: We always talk with you about our development and let you be part of it directly.

question1.title: ‚öôÔ∏è ~ Which programming languages do you support?
question1.description:
‚Ä∫ On our Discord server you'll find all known programming languages, from Python to Assembly. Since our community is very diverse and offers many different talents, it's very likely that your problem or question can be answered quickly.

‚Ä∫ Our server team mainly works with Python for Discord bots, Java for REST APIs & Minecraft plugins, and TypeScript for web development, for example for this very website.

question2.title: üåê ~ How can I put my project online?
question2.description:
‚Ä∫ There are many offers on the internet from platforms that offer to host your project for free, but we strongly advise against this as it poses massive privacy & security concerns.

‚Ä∫ We ourselves use DeinServerHost to get extremely powerful servers for little money, on which all our services run around the clock.

question3.title: ü§ñ ~ How do I develop my own Discord bot?
question3.description:
‚Ä∫ We have uploaded a small tutorial series on YouTube, in which we go through feature-by-feature in detail together with Python3.12 and discord.py - the library for Discord's API - and integrate them into our own Discord bot.

‚Ä∫ Livestreams take place on Twitch from time to time, where we continue working on this project together with you and also answer questions on the topic (or general programming questions).

question4.title: üìå ~ Do you have projects to learn from?
question4.description:
‚Ä∫ YES - Most of our projects are Open Source and therefore the complete source code can be read. This way you can learn how we implemented certain features (like a drag & drop system) or how to write unit tests.

‚Ä∫ You can also rebuild the projects for your own ideas and create something completely new! We are always very happy about your own creativity - you can find all our projects here on Github.
